rooms.description: Spacious living area with colonial aesthetic, featuring reclaimed wood elements and neutral colors. Includes a central seating arrangement.
Integrated dining space adjoining the living room, colonial style with elegant chandeliers and vintage decor.
Modern colonial kitchen with open layout connecting to dining area. Features floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and a ventilation system in accordance with Vastu.
Quiet and secluded library space with built-in shelves. Designed to provide an ambiance for study and reading, ensuring privacy and natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows.
Penthouse bedroom with colonial design details. Features a king-size bed, ample storage, and a private balcony that offers serene views.
Modern bathroom with dual sinks and vanity, designed to be both functional and aesthetically pleasing. Incorporates Vastu by ensuring proper drainage.

openings.description: Large windows spanning the full height of the wall to maximize natural light and views.
Floor-to-ceiling window enhances brightness and ventilation in the kitchen.
Double door entry for privacy and ease of access.
Archway entrance to create a seamless connection with adjacent spaces.
